ValidationRule.description: Scheduled date is a required field unless a GS0 date has been specified.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"GUS Release") && ISNULL( Release_Date__c) && ISNULL( Planned_GUS_Release_Date__c ) && NOT( ISCHANGED( Number_of_Stamps__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Scheduled Release Date must be specified.
